# Timeline
You should start thinking about your satRday six months to a year before you'd like to run it. This gives you time to do all the important stuff:

- t-6months: Talk to us
- t-6months: Set a target date (plus a backup) 
- t-6months: Set initial budget
- t-5months: Book venue
- t-4.5months: Start looking for sponsors (if required)
- t-4months: Announce event
- t-4months: Call for speakers
- t-2months: Pick speakers
- t-1month: Final marketing push
- t-0months: Enjoy your satRday!
